00025 #include <math.h>
00026 
00027 #if !defined (POLOIDAL_COORD_H)
00028 #define POLOIDAL_COORD_H
00029 
00033 struct Coord2D{
00034     float R;
00035     float Z;
00036 };
00037 
00038 typedef struct Coord2D Coord2DType;
00039 
00040 
00042 class  poloidalCoord{
00043 public:
00045     float R;
00047     float Z;
00049     poloidalCoord(){
00050         R = 0;
00051         Z = 0;
00052     }
00054     poloidalCoord(double r,double z){
00055         R = r;
00056         Z = z;
00057     }
00059     poloidalCoord(float p[2]){
00060         R = p[0];
00061         Z = p[1];
00062     }
00064     poloidalCoord(Coord2D p){
00065         R = p.R;
00066         Z = p.Z;
00067     }
00069     inline float operator*(poloidalCoord &x){ return (R * x.R + Z * x.Z); }
00071     inline void  operator*=(float x){ R *= x; Z *= x; }
00073     inline void  operator/=(float x){
00074         float invx = 1/x;
00075         R *= invx;
00076         Z *= invx;
00077     }
00079     inline void  operator+=(const poloidalCoord &x){
00080         R += x.R;
00081         Z += x.Z;
00082     }
00084     inline void  operator-=(const poloidalCoord &x){
00085         R -= x.R;
00086         Z -= x.Z;
00087     }
00089     inline float norma(){ return sqrt(R * R + Z * Z); }
00091     inline float norma2(){ return R * R + Z * Z; }
00093     inline void operator=(const poloidalCoord &x){
00094         R = x.R;
00095         Z = x.Z;
00096     }
00098     inline void operator=(float p[2]){
00099         R = p[0];
00100         Z = p[1];
00101     }
00103     inline poloidalCoord operator+(const poloidalCoord &x){
00104         poloidalCoord sum;
00105         sum = *this;
00106         sum += x;
00107         return sum;
00108     }
00110     inline poloidalCoord operator-(const poloidalCoord &x){
00111         poloidalCoord sum;
00112         sum = *this;
00113         sum -= x;
00114         return sum;
00115     }
00117     inline poloidalCoord operator*(float x){
00118         poloidalCoord res;
00119         res = *this;
00120         res *= x;
00121         return res;
00122     }
00124     inline poloidalCoord operator/(float x){
00125         poloidalCoord res;
00126         res = *this;
00127         res /= x;
00128         return res;
00129     }
00131     inline void Normalize(){
00132         float L = norma();
00133         R/=L;
00134         Z/=L;
00135     }
00136 };
